items.content_html: This web app allows a user to use their microphone or upload a track to visualise the audio using Waveform and Frequency graphs. It is my final project for the CodeClan Professional Software Development course. The app consists of a front-end made using React state hooks, Web Audio API and Canvas. The back-end consists of a lightweight server made using Node and Express, and Multer is used to store files locally.
items.title: johnghr/Audio_Visualiser: This web app allows a user to use their microphone or upload a track to visualise the audio using Waveform and Frequency graphs. It is my final project for the CodeClan Professional Software Development course. The app consists of a front-end made using React state hooks, Web Audio API and Canvas. The back-end consists of a lightweight server made using Node and Express, and Multer is used to store files locally.
